Proteomic 2024 Workshop Info Class Photo Schedule Pre-work

Proteomic 2024 Faculty: Jennifer Geddes-McAlister, Florence Roux-Dalvai, Ben Muselius, Marie Pier Scott-Boyer, Mickael Leclercq September 16, 2024 - September 18, 2024 Workshop Info Welcome to the 2024 Proteomics Canadian Bioinformatics Workshop webpage!
